report.title: Fox Hunt
report.author: Croc_HunterDM
report.bodytext: Trip report: 20mg 5meoDIPT, oral dose, ~10mg /n insufflated. Subject, male, 21, 160lbs, lots /n of psychedelic experience. /n /n Hello! I'm a brave chemical researcher, always /n trying to push the envelope for the good of everyone. /n Eh heh. Actually, what I did last night resulted in /n a great trip, but the route which I took was quite /n reckless! Don't mess around with research chemicals /n unless you have a scale that can measure the usually /n very small doses which you need. A friend of mine, a /n very magic lady, lent me some 5-MeO-DiPT /n and I decided it was a must-try! /n /n At 10pm I took what I had eyeballed to be a twenty /n milligram dose of 5-MeO-DiPT, in a gelcap. The amount of /n powder needed was very miniscule, and I must take this /n opportunity again to warn that these small amounts /n really should be weighed precisely. At about midnight, /n I shook out a small amount of powder and divided it into /n what I 'thought' 5mg looked like. I got two very small /n lines, those of you into regularly snorting things would /n not be satisfied with the size of these lines, but this /n was no narcotic, this was a potent psychedelic! The /n powder didn't burn much at all, and the small amount /n of chemical taste in my drip was more than tolerable. /n I had noticed effects begin to start a mere half hour /n after dosing. I had fasted the entire day except for /n one or two light snacks, so I attribute the rapid onset /n to this. There was little nausea, just barely /n perceptable, but this soon faded as the trip began. /n I determined to boost my effects and thus insufflated /n the small lines two hours after dosing. Normally if /n you redose on this chemical, the literature says you /n have to take more, but I think that up the nose results /n in a faster onset and better bioavailibility. /n /n At 12:30 the effects fully came on, with first a set of /n low-hued visual distortions, followed by bright, /n colorful tryptamine hallucinations, very like what /n one would see on the traditional trips, acid, shrooms, /n morning glory, but much cleaner and more intense. The /n colors were really something, it was a continually /n shifting spectrum, the whole of my range of site /n cycling the colors in response to some rhythem I could /n not comprehend. During this come up and plateau of /n the drug, I felt a few mind effects of tripping, /n but overall I was very much in control at all times. /n /n I am pretty experienced with psychedelics, and moreso /n with with the OTC favorite DXM, so this may have /n something to do with the amount of control I maintained. /n The visual distortions were really something else, fully /n 3-D bumps and ridges appearing out of no where, objects /n swinging and flexing, etc. At one point I stared /n intently at my beige carpet, and was amazed to see it /n turn into flowing sand dunes! /n /n At about 3am I noticed a definent decrease in the /n effects of the 5-MeO-DiPT. At about this time I started /n to smoke a lot of weed, and also began to feel the /n body load come on. I got a few cramps up in my abdomen, /n like near my belly button for some reason. That was /n the worst of it, other than a general achey feeling all /n over, cleared up easily by ibuprofen. /n /n At this point, I actually started eating food! The bong /n had made me hungry, so I made several trips to the /n kitchen. Because I think vitamin C always helps trips /n along, I grabbed and orange and a slice of bread and /n devoured both in no time flat. Then I went back and /n got a pear, and then a banana; luckily we eat a lot of /n fruit in my family! I think my body preferred this /n healthy snack over anything else I could have eaten, /n although maybe the majority of fruit contributed /n something to my cramp, who knows. /n /n At 5:15am I was still tripping a little bit and getting /n mild visuals, so I decided to turn in, figuring I was /n sleepy enough from being awake so long that I wouldn't /n need a sedative. I expected tryptamine insomnia tho, /n and got my share of it. The hallucinations with only /n night lumination coming through my shaded windows were /n very cool, with my shadows 'freezing' in my line of /n sight. I tossed and turned a lot, mostly to try to /n appease my cramped abdomen. However by about 7am I /n fell asleep, and woke up at 11:30am with the aid of /n my alarm clock. /n /n It's now almost two the day after, /n and I still feel kind of muffle-headed and dizzy. /n Luckily I don't think that I really overdosed on this /n substance, and if I did, the OD wasn't harsh or totally /n bad. Since I weighed out my doses just by eyeballing, /n a very risky way to do things, there's no way really to /n say how much I took, although in my research I see /n that the average dose is at the high end 20mg, and /n at the insane end 40mg+. This was a very enjoyable /n trip, and I've never had visuals this good! This was my /n first real experience with a research chemical, and I /n must say that I'm really impressed. My hat goes off /n to our country's chemists, always preparing new and /n exciting (and legal!) substances for the exploration /n of conciousness. I'd like to throw in my voice and /n say that 5-MeO-DiPT is very enjoyable, and I'd like to see /n more work done on this and other chemicals so that they /n are more mainstream and safe and no longer need to be /n 'reasearched.'
